title: British Typhoon fighter jets practiced intercepting US B-52 bombers over the North Sea
text:
A US Air Force B-52 in formation with RAF Typhoon aircraft over the North Sea, October 28, 2019. Cpl. Alex Scott/UK Ministry of Defense

Since they deployed to Europe on October 10, the B-52s have carried out training missions across all the continent: They have conducted a 12-hour extended duration sortie over the Black Sea region on October 19; three "Buffs" flew over the Baltic region on October 23 and at least one was involved in joint training with the French Air Force on October 25, when a B-52, accompanied by Rafales, refueled from a FAF C-135FR over France.
description: The B-52s are in Europe as part of the Bomber Task Force, an ongoing mission to reassure partners and deter Russia.
